decimal stored as a base 1e18 uint256, issuance accurate to 8 digits precision)","underlying":"the address of the underlying token "}},"mint(address,uint128,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying tokens to lend","maturity":"the maturity of the market","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being lent"}},"redeem(address,uint128,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying tokens to redeem and bond tokens to burn","maturity":"the maturity of the market being redeemed","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being
